concept.title: Monitoring a JDBC Lookup
concept.shortdesc: When you monitor a pipeline that includes the JDBC Lookup processor, the Summary tab displays statistics about the queries that the JDBC Lookup processor performs. Use the statistics to help identify any performance bottlenecks encountered by the pipeline.

conbody.p: JDBC Lookup processormonitoringJDBC Lookup processorstatisticsWhen you select the JDBC Lookup processor in the canvas while monitoring a running pipeline, the Summary tab displays the following stage statistics:
The Select Queries Meter displays the number of queries that the processor makes per second. The Select Queries Timer displays the average amount of time that the queries take to complete.
